metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5090 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in KVM. An improper check insvm_set_x2apic_msr_interception() may allow direct access to host x2apicmsrs when the guest resets its apic, potentially leading to a denial ofservice condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-13-generic - 6.5.0-13.13
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic - 6.5.0-13.13
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic-64k - 6.5.0-13.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-aws - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-gcp - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-lowlatency - 6.5.0-13.13.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-13.13.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1012-oracle - 6.5.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1007-raspi - 6.5.0-1007.9
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1004-starfive - 6.5.0-1004.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1006-laptop - 6.5.0-1006.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-13.13').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1010.10').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1010.10').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-13.13.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1012.12').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1007.9').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1004.5').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1006.9').
